challenge.title: Mathematical Modeling and Simulation with MATLAB - Chapter 3
challenge.description: Megan Buzby and Sheldon Lee's Mathematical Modeling and Simulation with MATLAB introduces scientific modeling through MATLAB.
challenge.instructions: Read Megan Buzby's Mathematical Modeling and Simulation with MATLAB Chapter Three and complete all questions with provided solutions.
